Pax redux, or, The Christian reconciler in three parts : being a project for re-uniting all Christians into one sole communion / done out of French into English by Philip Ayres ... Ayres, Philip, 1638-1712.
[26], 86 p.
Printed and sold by Andrew Sowle ..., London : 1688.
"Published by authority." Errata: p. 86. Imperfect: slightly faded. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
